com.stripe.stripepos.adapter

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.stripepos.adapter.Adapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BbposBluetoothAdapter

    public abstract class Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
    The Adapter interface defines the common behavior that should be implemented in order to connectReader and interact with any reader model.

        public abstract void collectPaymentMethod(PaymentIntent paymentIntent)
        Start the process of attaching a source to the PaymentIntent specified.

        paymentIntent - The PaymentIntent that the source should be attached to

        Connect to the Reader specified.
        Parameters:

        public abstract void discoverReaders(DiscoveryConfiguration config)
        Discover any readers that are available to connectReader to.
        Parameters:
        config - The DiscoveryConfiguration that should be used in the discovery process
